resources.string: Please wait while installing AA data 1.1.1 to external storage (e.g. SD card) ...
Adora AA Data 1.1.1 installed successfully. You can uninstall the data app to save main device space any time.
Sorry but your external storage (e.g. SD card) is not ready for writing file. Please check and resolve it first, then re-open Adora AA Data app.
